ygData.subject: Re: Summon Element Scroll
ygData.msgSnippet: You managed to get research items off of Kobolds that are well below 10th level?!  Are there higher level kobolds there that I don t know about?  From what I
ygData.messageBody:
You managed to get research items off of Kobolds that are well below 10th
level?! Are there higher level kobolds there that I don't know about? From
what I have found most mobs that give up research items are around 16th
level and up.

-- Elidain

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Michael Haferkamp [mailto:haferkam@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 8:08 AM
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Summon Element Scroll
>
>
> From: "Michael Haferkamp" <haferkam@...>
>
> I believe that I have an item matching that name in the bank. I
> thought it
> was a reserch item. I got it and all my reserch items of off
> kobolds in the
> Erudin forest.
> Starfall of Rallos Zek
>
<snip>
